description_for_human: Deep AI memory system connected to your Mem account. Create notes, search, organize collections and upload files automatically.
description_for_model: A complete memory interface to the Mem API. Supports creating notes, searching, updating, listing collections, uploading files, organizing content, and retrieving any stored data.

auth.instructions: Use the user's Mem API key as Bearer token. Header: Authorization: Bearer <MEM_API_KEY>
